titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of St. Tammany Day on May 1, 2003, as a national day of recognition for Tamanend and the values he represented.
Supporting the goals and ideals of St. Tammany Day on May 1, 2003, as a national day of recognition for Tamanend and the values he represented.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of St. Tammany Day as a national day of recognition for Amerindian Tamanend (a sachem of the Lenni Lenape) and the values he represented.
